page.title: 14Urdd Eisteddfod
page.content: The{Urdd Eisteddfod}gives everyone the oportunity to compete against children from all parts of Wales in {competitions}such as{singing, dancing, {acting, playing instruments}and{art and{craft}competitions. The first Eisteddfod takes place in school on {ST.Davids Day}and the winners represent the school in the area Eisteddfod for the whole of Ogwr. The winners in this Eisteddfod and those who are fortunate enough to win here can represent their country in the {Urdd National Eisteddfod. The{Urdd National Eisteddfod}was held in{Cardiff}this year. It was a very enjoyable and successful event and for once, nobody had to wear wellies because the weather was as good as the Eisteddfod.
